data.event: The first house in Troy was built in 1856, and the first store opened in 1857.
The first house in Troy was built in 1856, and the first store opened in 1857.

event.title: was incorporated as a city in 1860

data.event: Troy was incorporated as a city in 1860.
The first post office in Troy was established in March, 1857.

British explorer Richard Francis Burton en route to California in 1860 noted: "Passing though a few wretched shanties called Troy ..." Troy is located at 39°47′17″N 95°05′27″W (39.788099, -95.090840).
